alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 4:39AM CST until January 02 at 2:48PM CST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Tennessee... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including New England...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor flooding expands along Sells Lane in Trenton...Mason Road near Rising Fawn...and Creek Road near New England. All these roads will be closed. Also minor flooding expands much further downstream as the creek crosses the Tennessee border into the Tiftonia area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest and expected to fall below flood stage later this morning and continue falling. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
